content:
Parameters determined ex-ante:

EF), emission factor of the grid

The emission factor of the crediting period of the Project has been determined ex-ante in the registered PDD ™! and VCS-PD ™. The emission factor of 1.1459 tCO.e/MWh used in the monitoring period has been verified against the registered PDD and found consistent.

[Calibration]

During this monitoring period, the installed metering equipments have been operating well and were duly calibrated. The calibration records are shown in Table 2 below.

Table 2 The calibration records of the meters

Meter | Serial number | Accurac | Calibration | aibration validity Calibration entity ID y date 25/11/2008 10021873 0.5S M1 25/07/2009 25/07/2010 Northeast Electric Power 25/14/2008 Research Institute 20070558020065 0.5 Co.,Ltd M2 25/07/2009 25/07/2010

Calibration Entity: Northeast Electric Power Research Institute Co.,Ltd. with the code of No.CNAS L0440.

The monitoring plan requires that the meters with accuracy no lower than class 0.5, should be properly configured and checked annually.
